product_name: Snow Peak Titanium Mini Solo Cookset
long_description: Traveling light and fast? This minimalist kit packs your kitchen into a tiny space, and weighs about 5 ounces. Kit includes 28-fl. oz. pot with lid and a lightweight, 10 fl. oz. cup; pot nests inside cup, Giga(TM) stove nests inside pot. Both pot and cup have a handle that folds flat for packing. Rounded bottom edges are easy to clean and improve heating efficiency. Comes with a lightweight nylon storage bag; stowed dimensions are 4.25 (diameter) x 5.2 (height) inches.
short_description: Traveling light and fast? This minimalist kit packs your kitchen into a tiny space, and weighs about 5 ounces.
